yuri:PortraitOfMarkov.NAME: Portrait of Markov
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [R] at the start of your turn. NL At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yGlitched. NL Disables #rOmamori. NL Upon pickup obtain a special #rCurse.

yuri:BookOfBooks.NAME: Book of Books
yuri:BookOfBooks.FLAVOR: A book containing instructions on how to read books. Comes with a free book.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup choose an #yUpgraded #yBook to obtain. NL Your #yBooks are played twice.

yuri:yuriKnife.NAME: Knife
yuri:yuriKnife.FLAVOR: The thing is, I'm kind of into knifes.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yInsanity and #b1 #yPeace.

yuri:BloodyKnife.NAME: Bloody Knife
DESCRIPTIONS: You no longer lose health from Insanity. NL May have unexpected side effects.

yuri:GlassOfWater.NAME: Glass of Water
yuri:GlassOfWater.FLAVOR: A poorly drawn glass of water. Perhaps drinking from it will calm you down.

yuri:PortableGlitches.NAME: Portable Glitches
yuri:PortableGlitches.FLAVOR: A bag full of glitches. Eating them should help you break the enemies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply #b1 #yGlitched to ALL enemies.

yuri:GlassOfWine.NAME: Glass of Wine
yuri:GlassOfWine.FLAVOR: A poorly drawn glass of wine. Drinking from it will definitely not calm you down.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b3 #yInsanity.

yuri:GlitchPowder.NAME: Glitch Powder
DESCRIPTIONS: Damage reduction for #yGlitched is twice as effective on enemies.
